scripts.database: dotenv -- cross-var surreal start --user %DB_USER% --pass %DB_PASSWORD% --log error file://./database/surrealdb
scripts.export: dotenv cross-var surreal export --user %DB_USER% --pass %DB_PASSWORD% --database runtah --namespace runtah --conn http://0.0.0.0:8000 file://./database/export/export.surql
